set(CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)

file(GLOB IMPLOT_INCLUDE CONFIGURE_DEPENDS 
  ${IMPLOT_DIR}/*.h
  ${IMPLOT_DIR}/*.cpp
)

if(UNIX)
  SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -DIMGUI_IMPL_OPENGL_LOADER_GLAD2")
endif()

add_library(
  IMPLOT_LIB STATIC
  ${IMGUI_INCLUDE}
  ${IMPLOT_INCLUDE}
)

target_link_libraries(
  IMPLOT_LIB
  IMGUI_LIB
  ${OPENGL_LIBRARIES}
  glfw
)

target_include_directories(
  IMPLOT_LIB PUBLIC
  ${THIRD_DIR}/imgui
  ${THIRD_DIR}/implot
  ${OPENGL_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${IMPLOT_DIR}
)
